attributes.action: Open back up queens road in Southport
attributes.additional_details: Re access the use of the through route to aid local businesses and to b b posts the towns income.
attributes.background: Queens road in southport was always a well used route into the town accessing Southport town centre from the south of the town , some years ago it was made no entry at both ends to accommodate a bike lane that isn’t rarely used . The road can still be accessed via side roads.
